about_the_game: Friends! We present you another New Year's story about the heroes of Zeliria Sanctuary! The DLC for our first story is called "Let's take another walk" and tells how the life of Maxx and Velga turned out... on Earth! This a bit philosophical, a bit joyful and a bit sad story will give you a look at your favorite characters from a new side. Yes, yes, and Humkey too :) Have a nice game!
detailed_description: Friends! We present you another New Year's story about the heroes of Zeliria Sanctuary! The DLC for our first story is called "Let's take another walk" and tells how the life of Maxx and Velga turned out... on Earth! This a bit philosophical, a bit joyful and a bit sad story will give you a look at your favorite characters from a new side. Yes, yes, and Humkey too :) Have a nice game!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: Happy New Year, Zeliria! - Let's take another walk!

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Happy New Year, Zeliria! - Let's take another walk!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

short_description: This story tells an alternative story when Maxx with his chosen one, Velga, returns to Earth.
